properties.description: All are welcome, fully accessible different activities cater for lonely and isolated, but all welcome. Open to all, we have a fully accessible premises with a Changing places facility including a hoist. A Foodbank , CAB, Bereavement and Memory cafe also meet on the premises (times vary) Craft groups on Tuesday morning, with cakes available Wed, Thurs & Sa

properties.description: We provide free tea, coffee & cakes. We can also provide a free hot light lunch. We have pool, table tennis, the daily newspapers and lovely people to chat with.

properties.description: Open to those of all faiths and none. The church is open every day from 9am-3pm and the Lady Chapel is a warm and cosy quiet space. Free weekly session for Ukranian guests; monthly TLC session for those feeling isolated; fortnightly craft group
